name: Mountain Running in the Canadian Rockies
categories: Mountain Running in the Canadian Rockies
description: Find all of the best classic and newly established trails in the Canadian Rockies. For leisure joggers, long-distance runners, adventure racers, hikers, and fastpackers, this guide will set you up with a suitable mountain adventure. This edition covers Kananskis (Bragg Creek), Spray Lakes, Ghost Wilderness, Canmore, Banff, Assiniboine and Kootenay country (Hwy 93). Each description includes accurate, full-colour maps with distance and elevation gains, and GPS tracks of all routes.
